appDesc.message: How to limit the diffusion of personally identifiable information and protect users's privacy against Web tracking and other dangerous privacy threats.

OptionsLabel6_label.message: Privacy for unexperienced or novice users. Select the level of protection that suits your wants and needs. For each level we will activate, on behalf of you, the needed techniques to protect your privacy

OptionsLabel8_label.message: Privacy for expert users. Select here the category of privacy threats for which you want to provide the correct countermeasures

OptionsLabel15_label.message: Techniques that limit the diffusion of your Personally Identifiable Information

OptionsLabel16_label.message: Click on the 'Blockable Objects' field to inspect the resources discovered in your navigation and that could be blocked

OptionsLabel20_label.message: Filter out potentially identifying HTTP headers

OptionsLabel21_label.message: Filter out cookies and referer in JavaScript code

OptionsLabel28_label.message: Techniques to address the Web tracking privacy threat:

OptionsLabel29_label.message: Click on the 'Blockable Objects' field to inspect the resources discovered in your navigation and that could be blocked:

OptionsLabel34_label.message: Filter out objects from top-10 third party domains

OptionsLabel39_label.message: Techniques that block objects retrieved by third party domain servers and in general unwanted content

OptionsLabel40_label.message: Click on the 'Blockable Objects' field to inspect the resources discovered in your navigation and that could be blocked:

OptionsLabel41_label.message: Block requests for third party objects

OptionsLabel42_label.message: Filter out third party objects with "?", "=" or "&"

OptionsLabel46_label.message: You can specify which Web sites can be allowed. Type the domain (e.g. site.com) of the site you want allow and then click Allow

OptionsLabel66_label.message: Through NoTrace we are able to inspect how third party sites monitor users activities on the Web. Moreover, you can help us to build a much more detailed picture of the tracking activities made by large companies. If you would like to contribute to make the Web a safer place, please check the option below. You will send us which techniques you activate more often (for your visited Web sites), and statistics (i.e., counts) about their penetration in your navigation. not want to let us know your Web browsing history you can choose the Anonymous option, that will mask the address of the Web sites you visited.

OptionsLabel71_label.message: Send data back to us every

Options_Customized_desc.message: Customize NoTrace by yourself, according to your wants, needs and expertises

Options_Low_desc.message: Protect your personal information with no functional break

Options_Medium_desc.message: Protect your personal information and your navigation with no quality and functional break

Options_High_desc.message: Protect your personal information and your navigation against malicious activities on the Web. To ensure total privacy, some breaks may occur

deleteallresources_alert.message: Attention, this action will delete the items from all the three categories of privacy threats
